question: I want to marry my cousin, but my parents don't permit me.
answer:
QUESTION
Sir, I am in a deep spiritual relationship with my cousin and we talk over the phone, being so far from each other(I am in Australia and she is in Pakistan. My parents don't permit me to do so. Can I still marry her on my own according to Islam.
ANSWER


Share:
According to Shari'ah, an adult (boy and girl) reserve the right to marry a
partner of his/her choice. However, due to marriage being a major step in
one's life, it is advisable to make Mashwara (consult) with your seniors as
well as make Istikhaara (seek divine guidance). Somewhere on this site,
search 'Istikhaara' (without quotes).

You should also consider the advise of your parents as it is motivated by their love and concern for you.

And Allah Ta√£la Knows Best.

Was salaam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
